md:
giải nghĩa từ "substance" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Substance (noun)
	+ Meaning: a particular kind of matter or material that has certain properties
	+ Example: The substance of the cake was very sweet.
	+ Related words: material, matter, stuff, ingredient

* Substance (noun)
	+ Meaning: the most important or essential part of something
	+ Example: The substance of the speech was very inspiring.
	+ Related words: essence, core, heart, gist

* Substance (noun)
	+ Meaning: a person's wealth or property
	+ Example: He has a large substance in the bank.
	+ Related words: wealth, property, assets, fortune

Note: The word "substance" can have different meanings depending on the context in which it is used.
